Uses of Class
com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.device.transport.RetryDecision

  • Packages that use RetryDecision 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.device.transport
    A transport for sending and receiving IoT Hub messages, along with supporting functionality.

    • Uses of RetryDecision in com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.device.transport

      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.device.transport that return RetryDecision 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryDecision RetryPolicy.getRetryDecision(int currentRetryCount, TransportException lastException)
      Determines whether the operation should be retried and the interval until the next retry.
      RetryDecision NoRetry.getRetryDecision(int currentRetryCount, TransportException lastException)
      Always says to not retry.
      RetryDecision ExponentialBackoffWithJitter.getRetryDecision(int currentRetryCount, TransportException lastException)
      Determines whether the operation should be retried and the interval until the next retry.
